checktype.description: Detects general issues for an AWS account

checktype.description: Gathers TLS Certificate information

checktype.description: Checks if a domain have valid DNS configuration for DKIM

checktype.description: Checks if a domain have valid DNS configuration for DMARC

checktype.description: Checks for some vulnerable versions of Drupal

checktype.description: Checks for exposed BGP port on Internet routers

checktype.description: Checks if an asset has database well known ports open

checktype.description: Checks if an asset has FTP well known ports open and if they allow anonymous logins or if they are vulnerable to bounce attack

checktype.name: vulcan-exposed-hdfs
checktype.description: Checks if an asset has an Hadoop HDFS port exposed

checktype.name: vulcan-exposed-http-resources
checktype.description: This checks looks for a well known or custom list of exposed resources in an HTTP address

checktype.name: vulcan-exposed-http
checktype.description: Checks if an asset has HTTP well known ports open

checktype.name: vulcan-exposed-memcached
checktype.description: Checks if the asset contains an exposed Memcached server

checktype.name: vulcan-exposed-rdp
checktype.description: Checks if an asset has a RDP port exposed

checktype.name: vulcan-exposed-ssh
checktype.description: Checks SSH server configuration for compliance with Mozilla OpenSSH guidelines

checktype.name: vulcan-exposed-varnish
checktype.description: Checks if an asset has a Varnish server exposed

checktype.name: vulcan-exposed-heartbleed
checktype.description: Checks if an asset is vulnerable to Heartbleed

checktype.description: Analyzes the HTTP headers using Mozilla Observatory

checktype.name: vulcan-retirejs
checktype.description: Checks web pages for vulnerable JavaScript libraries

checktype.description: Scan docker images using aquasec/trivy

checktype.description: Runs the nmap-script vulners against the target opened ports
